author: elena
msg: Remove "revisits" and update saveXML according to the spec:
"if this parameter is null the whole document is serialized"

author: neilg
msg: fix a problem where we would happily throw away any SAXException a user emitted from any SAX ErrorHandler event, and return the SAXParseException passed in to the call instead.

author: elena
msg: SAX requires attribute.uri to be either Namespace URI or empty string, but not null.
